author: Shane Shifflett
title: How Active Are Senators on Facebook?
text:
Facebook Inc. Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg will face questions from members of the Senate Judiciary and Commerce committees on Tuesday. But how engaged are those lawmakers with the social-media platform Mr. Zuckerberg founded?
An analysis of Facebook posts published in the past year by 44 committee members found the two most active users, in terms of posts and followers, are New Jersey Democrat Cory Booker and Texas Republican Ted Cruz. Both have carved out national profiles, with Sen. Cruz having run for his partyâ€™s presidential...
